                           Release Notes

Comments :
San Francisco police officer Frank Connor (Garcia)is in a frantic search 
for a compatible bone marrow donor for his gravely ill son. There&#039;s only 
one catch the potential donor is convicted multiple murderer Peter 
McCabe (Keaton)who sees a trip to the hospital as the perfect opportunity 
to get what he wants most freedom. With McCabe&#039;s escape, the entire hospital 
becomes a battleground and Connor must pursue and, ironically, protect 
the deadly fugitive who is his son&#039;s only hope for survival.

Director : Barbet Schroeder

Writer: David Klass
